632370.name: Tower!2011:SE - New Orleans [KMSY] Airport
632370.description:
Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport [KMSY] for Tower!2011:SE

Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport is 11 miles west of downtown New Orleans. IATA:MSY, ICAO:KMSY. At an average of 4.5 feet (1.4 m) above sea level. There are two runways. New Orleans airport is the primary commercial airport for the New Orleans area and southeast Louisiana. The airport was formerly known as Moisant Field.
KMSY international airport has two terminals.
